column2: I have thought it over, and I cannot be the father of my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s baby. As it grows in her belly, I have trouble sleeping. I must put this matter to rest!
The maid I paid to spy on my [GetFromRelation] has confirmed my suspicions - [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is [From.GetFirstName]'s lover and the real father of the child!
When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName], blubbering about mercy and forgiveness!

When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!

The woman I hired to spy on my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has found out the shocking truth about her pregnancy. I was right, I am not the father... [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] is, her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!

I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. I stood there waiting, hoping she wouldn't come... but she did. She confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]!

I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. She came alright, and brokenly confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
My [GetFromRelation] just stormed in, roaring and smashing chairs. He knows about my affair with [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child I carry is not his...
[From.GetTitledName] knows about my affair with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child she carries is actually mine...
The maid I hired to gain my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s confidence has not found anything at all suspicious about her pregnancy.
The spies I hired at great expense to discover anything suspicious about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and her pregnancy have failed to turn up anything at all.
My dear [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is suspicious of my pregnancy. He is here right now asking me if the child is really his!
[From.GetFirstName] started crying when I asked her if she's being unfaithful. She profusely ensures me of her undying love, virtue and steadfastness...
[From.GetFirstName] got angry when I confronted her about the pregnancy, saying she lives in a prison and that I am denying her even the most basic freedoms...
I found a note from my beloved [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] to meet him behind the smithy today, but it was my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] who waited for me there!
By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I had better keep this quiet!
I guess the child must be mine then..?
I must KNOW. I will confront her directly!
He's such a baby. Wrap him around my finger.
[FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName] has borne the child of another man! I cannot believe this betrayal!
The fruit of [FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]'s shameful infidelity has finally been born. I still cannot believe [FromFrom.Mother.GetSheHe] would betray me so brazenly.
I am surely with child... my husband will be pleased.
I am surely with child... I wonder what my late husband would think of this.
I am surely with child... my consort will be pleased.
I am surely with child. I wonder which one of my consorts is the lucky father...
It seems my amorous adventures have resulted in a child - little [From.GetFirstName] is my spitting image.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has not only cheated on me, but has legitimized his accursed spawn!
My sweet [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has acknowledged the bastard child he had with some slut.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to acknowledge our baby as his.
The baby, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is surely my husband's bastard, though darling [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] denies it.
My labor was difficult and I fear that something is wrong with me. The midwives look worried, and I feel so terribly weak...
It seems my dalliance with [From.Mother.GetTitledFirstName] has resulted in a child. Fortunately, [From.Father.GetTitledFirstName] thinks little [From.GetFirstName] is his!
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is declared a legitimate [From.GetSonDaughter] with full inheritance rights.\n
All of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! other children's opinion of [Root.GetHerHim] changes by §R-40§! for §Y12§! months. §Y(Legitimized Bastard)§!

§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! remains illegitimate, but is sanctioned as my [From.GetSonDaughter] and can be married off to form alliances. If [From.GetSubjectPronoun] ever has children, a new dynasty will be created for that line.\n
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is denounced as a bastard with an unknown father, having no official connection to me at all.\n
Not my problem. [From.GetHerHisCap] mother will deal with this.
Lady [This.GetFirstName], the mother, is most pleased
[This.GetTitledFirstName], the mother's husband, is most displeased...
[This.GetFirstName] will be regarded as your [This.GetSonDaughter] and can be legitimized later
Unmarried and pregnant... The fates have cursed me!
Oh dear, I must be with child. Will my husband believe it is his?
Fate smiles upon me, my wife [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant!
My [GetFromRelation] is pregnant, but I was away, wasn't I?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] tells me she is pregnant, but that can't be right, can it?

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant and I can't possibly be the father! The realm is already astir with gossip - everyone knows [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is the real father.
I am surely with child... my lord will be pleased.
Oh dear, I must be with child. Will my lord believe it is his?
Fate smiles upon me, my concubine [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant!
You tell §Y[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetFirstName]§! he will be a father.
You tell a white lie to §Y[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]§!.
Tell §Y[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetFirstName]§! he will be a father
I am starting to think [From.GetTitledFirstName] might fancy me...
I awaken to the sound of my door creaking open... It's [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]!
I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!
Lady [From.GetFirstName] screamed and made a fuss in front of my own guards!

Despite my physicians' assurances to the contrary, giving birth only worsened my condition. The midwives look worried, and I feel so terribly weak... I am bound to my bedroom, in a state halfway between nightmares and reality, struggling, on the brink of death.

My labor worsened the already precarious condition I was in. The midwives look worried, and I feel so terribly weak... I am bound to my bedroom, in a state halfway between nightmares and reality, struggling, on the brink of death.
